turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three small pizzas. One of them should have mushrooms, another of them should have pepperoni and another of them should be a buffalo chicken pizza with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want extra cheese on all the pizzas or just the buffalo chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna has an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. I'd like to order for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, your total will be $42, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, one mushroom, one pepperoni and one buffalo chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds great. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all. You've been a great help. Thanks.
